alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 11:11AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 1145 AM EST... At 1110 AM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Chambers Estates to 10 miles east of Key Biscayne. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Miramar, Miami Beach, Coral Gables, Key Biscayne, South Miami, Surfside, Miami Gardens, Virginia Key, Hallandale, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Sunny Isles Beach, Opa-Locka and Miami Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the showers passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
